ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 34
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Where to find ore? Freeport, Steamfont mountains, High hold, and the Dark Elf City all have Ore. Confirmed not to have ore at all Halas, Kaladim,
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 6
> Date: Fri, 30 Apr 1999 06:54:50 -0400
> From: MCollins <sandman1@...>
>Subject: Smithing
>
>I am a beginning smith based in Qeynos and i am having a great deal of
>trouble finding ore near that city. I was told that the closest place
>to find ore was in the Dwarven area, but I find it hard to believe that
>I would have to go that far! Does anyone know of a place I can get ore
>within 2or 3 zones of Qeynos?
>
>Marc
>
>
Where to find ore?

Freeport, Steamfont mountains, High hold, and the Dark Elf City all have
Ore.

Confirmed not to have ore at all Halas, Kaladim, Fethwithe, Qeynos, and
Kelethin.

Derri!
